content: bigger bra you can continue wiht more row finishing sew the both bra parts on the front and then crochet across edge trim 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet and in the upper end of the bra parts we crochet 3 half_double_crochet chain 2 3 half_double_crochet in the middle single_crochet and then we crochet 1 row single_crochet across each stitch and in the same row we make straps so that in the upper chain-2 space make 70 chain and crochet 1 row single_crochet back
